scripts.bsc-testnet-deployer: ID=BSC npx hardhat run scripts/MasterDeployer.deploy.js --network bsc_testnet

scripts.bsc-mainet-deployer: ID=BSC npx hardhat run scripts/MasterDeployer.deploy.js --network binance
scripts.bsc-mainet-dictionary: ID=BSC npx hardhat run scripts/Dictionary.deploy.js --network binance
scripts.eth-testnet-deployer: ID=ETH npx hardhat run scripts/MasterDeployer.deploy.js --network rinkeby
scripts.eth-testnet-dictionary: ID=ETH npx hardhat run scripts/Dictionary.deploy.js --network rinkeby
scripts.eth-mainet-deployer: ID=ETH npx hardhat run scripts/MasterDeployer.deploy.js --network ethereum
scripts.eth-mainet-dictionary: ID=ETH npx hardhat run scripts/Dictionary.deploy.js --network ethereum
